channel.title: Website adds
channel.description: Can someone help me understand something, how do i get adds onto my website like with google adwords you need to pay but you advertise your own thing, i don't get it and i don't understand how the adds are put onto the page you want them on. Can someone explain this please and recommend a addvertiser that pays with paypal please. Thanks.

item.title: Website adds
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:2, topic:162803”]Google [ew] Adsense is one way, but be careful they are known by many to ban as soon as you make money.[/quote]Well i tried that, i want the money sent to a paypal account i think there is one that does that but i forget the name of the website.

Read full topic

item.title: Website adds
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

It’s called an ad, not an add.

Read full topic
